docs.snippet: Morality aside, the name causes the team financial harm....
docs.lead_paragraph: Morality aside, the name causes the team financial harm.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Profs Michael Lewis and Manish Tripathi outlines the business and marketing arguments against Washington Redskins retaining its name; describes their statistical model of team revenues, which shows that Redskins have experienced decreasing brand equity over past decade.

byline.original: By MICHAEL LEWIS and MANISH TRIPATHI

docs.snippet: Nigeria coach Stephen Keshi says he is saddened by the deadly explosion at an Abuja shopping mall shortly before his team played Wednesday at the World Cup, and that his team's progression to the second round is unlikely to offer any solace to the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigeria coach Stephen Keshi says he is saddened by the deadly explosion at an Abuja shopping mall shortly before his team played Wednesday at the World Cup, and that his team's progression to the second round is unlikely to offer any solace to the country as it suffers terrorist attacks.

headline.main: Nigeria Coach Saddened by Explosion at Home
headline.print_headline: Nigeria Coach Saddened by Explosion at Home

docs.snippet: The National Football League has agreed to remove a $675 million ceiling it had placed on payments to former players who were part of a groundbreaking lawsuit over concussions suffered on the field, it said on Wednesday....

headline.main: NFL Agrees to Eliminate Cap on Player Payments in Concussion Lawsuit

docs.snippet: Mr. Lucas, the “Star Wars” filmmaker, was denied a prime spot in the Presidio in San Francisco, so instead he chose a city where he lives part time....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Lucas, the “Star Wars” filmmaker, was denied a prime spot in the Presidio in San Francisco, so instead he chose a city where he lives part time.
docs.abstract: Filmmaker George Lucas, who struggled to get permission from officials in San Francisco to build a private museum dedicated to his collection of illustrations, comic art, graphic art, animation and other popular art forms, will instead build the museum in Chicago, where he lives part time.

headline.main: George Lucas Shifts Museum Plan to Chicago
headline.print_headline: Illinois: ‘Star Wars’ Creator Shifts Museum Plan to Chicago
